title: Ep. 204 Trend Following With Michael Covel
itunes:title: Trend Following With Michael Covel
description: This week, Michael Covel, best-selling author and podcast host joins S&A Investor Radio. He shows us how to use technical analysis to increase returns and lower risk.
content:encoded: This week, Michael Covel, best-selling author and podcast host joins S&A Investor Radio. He shows us how to use technical analysis to increase returns and lower risk.
